*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to James F. Perry, February 10, 1832. Santa Ana leading revolution in Mexico. Hopes to keep peace in Texas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="02-10-1832">Feb. 10 1832*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*Dr. *person_mentioned*Brother*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*I saw a man the other day at *location_mentioned*Harrisburgh */location_mentioned*who told me that there were two horses*location_mentioned* between Dickinsons Creek and Clear Creek */location_mentioned*one a roan, they are represented to be gentle American horses— have you found all yours or has any one in your *location_mentioned*neighborhood */location_mentioned*lost any horses—if so let them know of these two—*/p*
*p*I hope you have not neglected to send to *location_mentioned*Brazoria */location_mentioned*for the peach and figs and orange trees and to *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*H Austin*/person_mentioned*'s*/location_mentioned* for the grapes and plums—after this month it will be too late to set them out.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Genl. Santana*/person_mentioned* has taken up arms against the *person_mentioned*present administration */person_mentioned*of the general government and has possession of *location_mentioned*Vera Cruz*/location_mentioned* and the *location_mentioned*castle */location_mentioned*there. So far as I can judge by the *location_mentioned*Mexican papers, */location_mentioned*that part of the *location_mentioned*nation */location_mentioned*is in a state of civil war— I wish if possible to keep peace in *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*, and think that *person_mentioned*Fisher */person_mentioned*will be removed from office in a few days and also that the *person_mentioned*guard at the*location_mentioned* mouth of the river*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* will be ordered not to interfere with any vessels or perhaps it will be withdrawn entirely. I think the latter most probable.*/p*
*p*We are all well.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:]*person_mentioned* Mr. James F. Perry*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Chocolate Bayou*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
